channel.title: About on About Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in About on About Hugo

item.title: Why SSGs
item.description: I advocate for static web site generators (SSGs) as they are an excellent tool for web site content creation alone or in a team once you mastered the necessary software engineering skills.

item.title: About the Project
item.description: I’ve created this project to collect all the various hugo examples I’ve created over the last several years, to document and establish their usage as a learning tool in my various software development and web technology classes. Currently - as of May 2024 - it’s work in progress. Contributions are Welcome! How to Contribute As a Hugo project, creation and collaboration on this site is very similar to an open source software project.
